stx.io.http.Http<T>

type
interface
An interface for performing HTTP requests - GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE. The interface is generic in the type of the request/response data, because some implementations (e.g. JSONP on the JavaScript target) can only deal with certain kinds of data.

Instance Methods

custom(request : String, url : stx.net.Url, data : T, ?params : stx.net.QueryParameters, ?headers : stx.ds.Map<String, String>) : stx.Future<HttpResponse<T>>

delete(url : stx.net.Url, ?params : stx.net.QueryParameters, ?headers : stx.ds.Map<String, String>) : stx.Future<HttpResponse<T>>

get(url : stx.net.Url, ?params : stx.net.QueryParameters, ?headers : stx.ds.Map<String, String>) : stx.Future<HttpResponse<T>>

post(url : stx.net.Url, data : T, ?params : stx.net.QueryParameters, ?headers : stx.ds.Map<String, String>) : stx.Future<HttpResponse<T>>

put(url : stx.net.Url, data : T, ?params : stx.net.QueryParameters, ?headers : stx.ds.Map<String, String>) : stx.Future<HttpResponse<T>>
